about.paragraph1: I'm a <1>junior developer</1> from Argentina, passionate about combining technology and creativity to build innovative solutions. I love turning ideas into functional software while constantly learning and experimenting.
about.paragraph2: I've been exploring how to build <1>web apps</1>, design <3>databases</3>, and develop <5>mobile apps</5>, always focusing on clean code and user experience.
about.paragraph3: Currently diving into modern frameworks and technologies like Flutter and React, building real-world projects that challenge and grow my skills.
